title: Himi 605
lyrics:
8 & 7
1.
Tuʻu ‘o tau, Kalisitiani,
‘Oua te ke nofo noa;
Ko e fili ē ke tali,
Kuo pau ke fai kotoa.
Kuo tā ‘a e ‘uluafi,
Laka atu lototo’a;
‘I he ivi ‘o e Lami
Te tau fu’u ikuna noa.
2.
Kuo pau ke tau mo’ua
‘I he Tau ‘a Laumālie,
Ko e ‘eiki mo e tu’a,
‘A e fa’ahinga fulipē.
Kuo tā, etc.
3.
Tuku muʻa ho’ tangi nofo!
Nofo, ka ke hopoate?
Ka pehē pē si’a loto,
Ko e fi
e
pōpula pē.
Kuo tā, etc.
4.
‘O ka ‘ikai te te taa’i,
Kuo pau ke taa’i au.
Monū ‘oku ai ha mafi
Ke tokoni ‘i he tau:
Kuo tā, etc.
5.
Tā ‘a e fili ‘i he loto,
Tā ‘a e kovi ofi mai;
Tā ‘a e mele ‘o e nofo,
Maumau’anga he kakai.
Kuo tā, etc.
6.
Tau, ‘o ‘oua fiungofua;
‘Oua e lau he fuoloa:
Ko e tau ke motupula,
‘Oua pē ke tō kotoa.
Kuo tā ‘a e ‘uluafi,
Laka atu lototo’a;
‘I he ivi ‘o e Lami
Te tau fu’u ikuna noa. *
